c74object.name: the.cerebellum
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2020, www.xenorama.com.
Control an instance's recording/rendering behaviour.
Connect to data stream incoming from leftmost inlet or a patcherargs of an instance linked to a rendering context hosted by the.jit.renderer~.

objarg.name: render-context
objarg.digest: Specify a named render context to bind to.

objarg.name: identifier
objarg.description: Provide the parent instance's class to identify it in the central queue manager of the.jit.renderer~.

objarg.name: active-flag-override
objarg.digest: Specify the active flag setting to assume when overrided by 'solo' mode.
objarg.description: Specify the active flag setting to assume when overrided by 'solo' mode. If another object's 'solo' state is nonzero, this settings specifies which active flag the parent instance is to assume. By default, or if ommitted, this is 0 ('bypass'), set to 5 alternatively ('mute'). flags 1-4 will be ignored and set to 0.
